trans-unit.resname: PWOR·1 | Balduvian Horde | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a card at random.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a card at random.

trans-unit.resname: PWOR·2019 | Crucible of Worlds | Card Name
PWOR·2019 | Crucible of Worlds | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may play lands from your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: You may play lands from your graveyard.

trans-unit.resname: PWOR·2019 | Crucible of Worlds | Flavor Text
